messages.message: @Xi Cheng There seems to be a lot of 5xx errors from webapp also. we donâ€™t have gRPC client stats in webapp yet. Do you think it may be because of RPC errors to file service in webapp?

@abhitaker I will share a detailed report later tonight, but in a nutshell, the 5xx error (actually 504) came from webapp (as can be seen from a figure above that shows 50% error came from address/port from webapp). I have inspected a quarantined webapp pod that runs on nearly 100% requested CPU, and it seems busy waiting/deadlocked. Based on what we understood, this likely is caused by grpc having issues with gevent, which we recently confirmed with the grpc team. We do have a plan to mitigate this and I will share that later in the channel.
